mapper.select: select endicia_label.* from endicia_label where endicia_label.id=#{id}
select endicia_label.* from endicia_label where endicia_label.user_id=#{userId}

select distinct endicia_label.* from endicia_label left join `users` as u on endicia_label.user_id=u.id endicia_label.user_id = #{userId} and `endicia_label`.`create_date` >= #{sdate} and `endicia_label`.`create_date` <= #{edate} and (`endicia_label`.`labelType` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`value` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`mailpieceShape` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`description` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toState` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCountry` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toPhone` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCompany` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toPostalCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCountryCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCity` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toAddress1` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toName` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`mailClass` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromPhone` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromPostalCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromState` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromCity` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`returnAddress1` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromName` like #{labelInfo} ) and ( u.nick_name like #{userInfo} or u.real_name like #{userInfo} or u.phone like #{userInfo} or u.qq like #{userInfo} or u.country like #{userInfo} or u.address like #{userInfo} ) order by endicia_label.create_date desc,endicia_label.id limit #{index},#{size}

select count(*) from endicia_label left join `users` as u on endicia_label.user_id=u.id endicia_label.user_id = #{userId} and `endicia_label`.`create_date` >= #{sdate} and `endicia_label`.`create_date` <= #{edate} and (`endicia_label`.`labelType` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`value` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`mailpieceShape` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`description` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toState` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCountry` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toPhone` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCompany` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toPostalCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCountryCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toCity` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toAddress1` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`toName` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`mailClass` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromPhone` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromPostalCode` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromState` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromCity` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`returnAddress1` like #{labelInfo} or `endicia_label`.`fromName` like #{labelInfo} ) and (u.nick_name like #{userInfo} or u.real_name like #{userInfo} or u.phone like #{userInfo} or u.qq like #{userInfo} or u.country like #{userInfo} or u.address like #{userInfo} )
